The average temperature in Ahvaz city is 32 °C in January, 38 °C in April and 49 °C in July. Average of annual rainfall is 213 mm per year, mainly falling December to April. The study area is characterised as mainly alluvial and sedimentary rocks, with sand and silt fractions comprised of quartz, and fine silt and clay fractions mainly controlled by clay minerals
